channel.title: AI Applications on Mengchen Yang
channel.description: Recent content in AI Applications on Mengchen Yang

item.title: Mengchen's IT Project at Accenture
item.description: Background Upon the graduation from Binghamton University in December 2018, I came back to China and joined Accenture's IT consulting Service in Beijing. Processing academic experiences in management information system, I looked forward to sovle some real world issues with the help of emerging technologies. I worked on a team that provides human-centered automation solutions such as Robotic Process Automation to big companies. As a junior analyst, I am responsbible for the analysis of the business requirements and design feasible improvement and implementation plans.
